main.name: Cat Boss
main.description_trust_me: Trust me, I am a Cat.
main.description_moon: We'll take you to the moon
main.bio_mission: Our mission: to run the purr-fect validation service that all cat lovers can be proud of!
main.bio_mission_description_intro: We are DPoS validators who want to raise awareness for cats as well as provide you with simple, secure, and sustainable staking and node infrastructure.
main.bio_mission_description: To inject more cattitude to the crypto space and make the staking experience more radi-claw and fun whilst still providing professional services to you.
main.bio_mission_no_cat_litter: A portion of our earnings will go directly to animal shelters.
main.bio_support_us: Donâ€™t fur-get to support us on our twitter and telegram!
main.bio_ryuuash: 1.     Ryuash is a software engineer with a huge fetish for saving cats.
main.bio_mandoka: 2.     Mandoka is a full-time cat lady who part-time codes to afford gourmet cat food for her master.
main.bio_nayn: 3.     NAYN is an avid cypto-lover who likes to HODL his cat to the moon and through the dip.
main.bio_ps: PS. Although we believe cats are the ultimate superior animal, we are also friends with doge and shiba inu.

team.description: These are my trusty underlings, if you don't trust me, you should at least trust them

members.name: MANDOKA
members.bio: Full-time cat lady who programs to afford gourmet cat food for her master. She's not secretly plotting to take over the world or anything.

members.name: NAYN
members.bio: Avid cypto-lover who likes to HODL his cat to the moon and through the dip. He knows where the treasure is and won't hesitate.

members.name: RYUASH
members.bio: Probably the most chaotic programmer on the team. Little bit shy and most likely planning something. Ryuash is a cat raised by dogs.

networks.title: Validator Service
networks.description: Cat Boss provides validation services for dPoS networks listed below. We are actively expanding and will join more networks very soon!
